title: 01. Functions, Variables
description: Exploring the fundamental building blocks of Python: functions, variables, data types, and code structure.

title: 02. Conditionals
description: Mastering logic and control flow with if, elif, and else statements.

title: 03. Loops
description: Automating repetitive tasks efficiently using for and while loops.

title: 04. Exceptions
description: Handling errors gracefully with try, except, and finally blocks.

title: 05. Libraries
description: Leveraging the power of Python's ecosystem by importing and using external libraries.

title: 06. Unit Tests
description: Ensuring code quality and correctness with automated tests.

title: 07. File I/O
description: Reading from and writing to files to persist data and interact with the file system.

title: 08. Regular Expressions
description: Finding and manipulating text with powerful pattern-matching techniques.

title: 09. Object-Oriented Programming
description: Understanding classes, objects, and inheritance to write modular code.

title: 10. Et Cetera
description: Exploring additional advanced topics and best practices in Python.
